potionbrewer:Barb.NAME: Barb
DESCRIPTION: Metallic barb harvested from a Spiker.
Gain BB Block. Deal DD Damage.

potionbrewer:Bile.NAME: Bile
DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Temporary Strength whenever you play a Skill.
Gain 1 Temporary Strength whenever you play a Skill.

potionbrewer:Bludgeon.NAME: Bludgeon
DESCRIPTION: Vintage weapon taken from a Knight.

potionbrewer:Clay.NAME: Clay
DESCRIPTION: Clay harvested from a Giant Head.

potionbrewer:Ether.NAME: Ether
DESCRIPTION: Magical vapor harvested from a Mystic.

potionbrewer:FeyFire.NAME: Fey Fire
DESCRIPTION: Otherworldly flame collected from a Collector.

potionbrewer:Flame.NAME: Flame
DESCRIPTION: Flaming core of an odd machine.

potionbrewer:Hand.NAME: Hand
DESCRIPTION: Dessicated hand harvested from a sneak-thief.

potionbrewer:Horn.NAME: Horn
DESCRIPTION: Crooked horn harvested from a Gremlin Leader.

potionbrewer:Jaw.NAME: Jaw
DESCRIPTION: The jawbone of a giant monster.
Odd Turns: 5 block, Even Turns: 8 Damage.

potionbrewer:LaserCore.NAME: Laser Core
DESCRIPTION: Odd turns: Deal 12 Damage, Even turns: Deal 0 Damage.

potionbrewer:Lightning.NAME: Lightning
DESCRIPTION: Electric charge from a repulsor's power core.

potionbrewer:Mechanism.NAME: Mechanism
DESCRIPTION: The mechanical core of an Automaton.
Deal 30 Damage. Place a Void on top of your draw pile.
Deal DD Damage. Place a Void on top of your draw pile.

potionbrewer:Meteorite.NAME: Meteorite
DESCRIPTION: Piece of strange metal from another world.

potionbrewer:Needle.NAME: Needle
DESCRIPTION: Sharp splinter of metal from a ghostly knife.
Damage is dealt Turn Number times.

potionbrewer:Nethershroud.NAME: Nethershroud
DESCRIPTION: The ghostly shroud of the Nemesis.

potionbrewer:PhilosopherShard.NAME: Philosopher's Shard
DESCRIPTION: Shard of the legendary Philosopher's Stone.

potionbrewer:Pocketwatch.NAME: Pocketwatch
DESCRIPTION: Timekeeping device taken from an Eldrich Horror.

potionbrewer:PowerCore.NAME: Power Core
DESCRIPTION: The power core of a guardian mechanism.

potionbrewer:Pyramid.NAME: Pyramid
DESCRIPTION: Bizarre object harvested from an anthropomorphic shape.

potionbrewer:RitualJar.NAME: Ritual Jar
DESCRIPTION: Odd relic found near an Awakened Beast.

potionbrewer:Root.NAME: Root
DESCRIPTION: Root harvested from a carnivorous plant.
Gain 1 Temporary Dexterity whenever you play an Attack.
Gain 1 Temporary Dexterity whenever you play an Attack.

potionbrewer:SerpentSkull.NAME: Serpent Skull
DESCRIPTION: The skull of a giant serpent.

potionbrewer:Skull.NAME: Skull
DESCRIPTION: Stained skull taken from a slaver.
Shuffle a #yReaction into your draw pile.
Shuffle a *Reaction into your draw pile.

potionbrewer:Slime.NAME: Slime
DESCRIPTION: Slime harvested from one of the Spire's pests.

potionbrewer:Spore.NAME: Spore
DESCRIPTION: A fungal Spore harvested from a parasitic fungus.

potionbrewer:Sulphur.NAME: Sulphur
DESCRIPTION: Sulphur harvested from a strong man.
Gain BB Block. Deal DD Damage.

potionbrewer:Tentacle.NAME: Tentacle
DESCRIPTION: Severed tentacle of one of the Spire's horrors.

potionbrewer:TinyHat.NAME: Tiny Hat
DESCRIPTION: A stylish hat, taken from a giant slime.

potionbrewer:Tooth.NAME: Tooth
DESCRIPTION: Tooth harvested from a Jaw worm.

potionbrewer:Wax.NAME: Wax
DESCRIPTION: Sealing wax taken from a bandit leader.
